entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as one of the people who got out of the carriage. She is described as getting out along with Ron.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as one of the people who got out of the carriage. He is described as getting out along with Hermione.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as stepping down from the carriage and being addressed by Malfoy.

entities.name: malfoy
entities.description: Malfoy is described as elbowed past Hermione to block Harry's way up the stone steps. He is also mentioned as addressing Ron.

entities.name: longbottom
entities.description: Longbottom is mentioned by Malfoy as telling the truth about Harry fainting.

entities.name: lupin
entities.description: Professor Lupin is described as getting out of the next carriage and intervening in the situation between Malfoy and Ron.

entities.name: dementor
entities.description: A dementor is mentioned by Malfoy as frightening Harry.

entities.name: castle
entities.description: The castle is described as being up the stone steps that Harry and others are trying to reach.

entities.name: carriage
entities.description: The carriage is mentioned as swaying to a halt and people getting out of it.

relationships.description: Malfoy blocks Harry's way up the stone steps.
Professor Lupin intervenes in the situation between Malfoy and Ron.
Harry is frightened by a dementor.
Malfoy gives Professor Lupin an insolent stare, showing disrespect towards him.
Ron defends himself against Malfoy's teasing.
